Few Realize the Power of Mind Over Body.--But few realize the power that the mind has over the body. A great deal of the sickness which afflicts humanity has its origin in the mind and can only be cured by restoring the mind to health. There are very many more than we imagine who are sick mentally. Heart sickness makes many dyspeptics, 


                                                       397 

for mental trouble has a paralyzing influence upon the digestive organs.--3T 184 (1872).
